summary: Simple, clean, mobile-friendly website with Home, Login, and Stories pages where users can log in, post text-only short stories, and browse stories posted by others.

existing_features.title: Create a mobile-friendly Home page that introduces the app and provides clear navigation to Login and Stories pages.
Implement authentication using Internet Identity so users can sign in and sign out; require authentication for creating a new story.
Create a Stories page that lets authenticated users submit a text-only short story and lets all users browse stories posted by others.
Apply a clean, simple, mobile-friendly visual theme consistently across Home, Login, and Stories pages (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling). Avoid blue/purple as the primary palette.
Update the app/website name to "yor txt" everywhere it appears in the UI, including the top-left brand text in the header and the copyright line in the footer.
Update the HTML document title (the <title> tag in frontend/index.html) to use "yor txt".

new_feature_requests.summary: Create Home page with clean, mobile-friendly layout and navigation to Login and Stories
Implement Login page and user authentication flow (log in to post stories)
Create Stories page to post text-only short stories and view stories posted by other users
Apply clean, simple, mobile-friendly responsive design across all pages
Implement backend data model and APIs to store and retrieve text stories, including the author identity and creation timestamp, and persist them across canister upgrades.
